name: Corrupture
description:
A strange dark magic has swallowed the world. This power gives you strength... but at a cost.

This short, ~5 minute game was created for Ludum Dare 40, my first game jam ever. It was quite a blast to do!

CONTROLS
W,A,S,D - Move
Mouse - Aim and Fire

Tools:
Game Maker Studio Professional Edition - Yoyo Games
BFXR - Increpare
Bosca Ceoil - Terry Cavanagh
Aseprite
Adobe Photoshop CC 2017
